tool_description: Quotopia: A Flask-based web application that serves as your gateway to a world of wisdom, delivering random quotes from various authors at the click of a button.
name: Quotopia
title: Quotopia

api_list.name: quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quotopia.p.rapidapi.com/random-quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotopia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://quotopia.p.rapidapi.com/random-quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotopia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
